name: Man Pages - die.net Dark Blue
description:
Simple high contrast theme in dark blue.
Added color formatting to "i", "b", and a few other tags. The page also responds to the width of the browser window.

user.name: TheArkive
user.about:
I just theme stuff as I get to it, or as it annoys me...

The more it annoys me, the higher on the priority it gets to be themed!

I'll take requests, but I can't promise deadlines.

=======================

My style is always dark and easier on the eyes (been on a Dark Blue kick lately).  I prefer to have rows highlight on hover on almost every table.  I like buttons to do the same.
